components.description: Pro Max alloy 3-finger with reach adjust
Bio Tuned Ergonomic Components dual density anatomical design
26" x 1.9" smooth rolling all weather Touring
ProMax Linear Pull Brakes(F), ProMax Linear Pull Brakes(R)
Alloy Adjustable, 55 degree movement with 180mm quill insertion and removable cap.
Schwinn 'N Litened aluminum with New Comfort Tuned 68 geometry, Epicenter seat stays, removable derailleur hanger, rack and WB bosses. Low step over Women's.
Schwinn Comfort Tuned Plus Super Soft elastomer memory foam with special waterproof stretch cover
Alloy suspension with micro adjust head, pre-load adjust with 35mm travel
